data.title: Villa Rica Golden City Lions Club
data.text:
Join us at Facebook

The Villa Rica Golden City Lions Club

Villa Rica, Georgia

Our Eyeglasses Recycling for Sight Projecti is off to a great start! We were able to donate over 250 eyeglasses to the Georgia Lions Lighthouse foundation at our January 22, 2024 meeting. These glasses will be cleaned up and sent overseas for humanitarian projects helping those in need with a pair of glasses. Thank you to the following businesses for supporting our project:

Jones-Wynn Funeral Home

Vills Rica City Hall

Wal-Mart Vision

Fairfield Plantation City Hall

RWB Tax Service

Southern Dance Precision

Amy Brown State Farm Agency

Olive Tree Restaurant Villa Rica

Vision Source - Villa Rica

Evams Barbecue

Villa Rica High School Beta Club

Pictured above (from Left to right): GCLC members Lion Stacey and Lion Gina, and Lion Fran from GLLF.

Lions Clubs International is the world's largest service club organization with more than 1.4 million members in approximately 46,000 clubs in more than 200 countries and geographical areas around the world.
